ML_Engine.evaluation package¶

Evaluation Sub-package¶

Modules for model evaluation and metrics.

Submodules¶

ML_Engine.evaluation.metrics module¶

Evaluation Metrics¶

Functions for model evaluation and metrics calculation.

ML_Engine.evaluation.metrics.get_metric_result(y_true, y_pred, problem_type, selected_metrics=None, selected_targets=None, classification_metrics=None, regression_metrics=None)[source]¶

Compute evaluation metrics for each target.

Parameters:

  • y_true (array-like of shape (n_samples,) or (n_samples, n_targets)) – True target values.

  • y_pred (array-like of shape (n_samples,) or (n_samples, n_targets)) – Predicted target values.

  • problem_type ({'Classification', 'Regression'}) – Type of problem.

  • selected_metrics (list of str, optional) – Names of metrics to compute. If None, uses all default metrics for the problem type.

  • selected_targets (list of str, optional) – Names of target columns. If None and y_true is 1D, defaults to [“target”].

  • classification_metrics (dict, optional) – Custom classification metrics.

  • regression_metrics (dict, optional) – Custom regression metrics.

Returns:

Nested dictionary {target: {metric_name: metric_value}}.

Return type:

dict

ML_Engine.evaluation.metrics.show_metric_result(metric_result)[source]¶

Log metric results.

Parameters:

metric_result (dict) – Result dictionary from get_metric_result.
